articles.author: daniel.hani@sprylab.com
articles.title: Draconid 2023 meteor shower tonight: How to see the rare peak this October - BBC Science Focus Magazine
articles.description: It may be a minor shower, but conditions for the Draconid meteor shower are looking good: here's how to spot a shooting star this weekend.
articles.content: The Draconid meteor shower peaks tonight, and although considered a minor shower, conditions are looking reasonable. Another shower, the Southern Taurids are also in full swing, while the Orionids to… [+7846 chars]

articles.title: Rapid “Collective Motion” of Iron Atoms Discovered in Earth's Solid Inner Core - SciTechDaily
articles.description: A new study discovered rapid "collective motion" of iron atoms in Earth's inner core. This movement may explain the core's unexpected softness in seismic data and has implications for understanding Earth's magnetic field generation. The iron atoms that make u…
articles.content:
ByUniversity of Texas at AustinOctober 8, 2023
Charged ions interacting with the Earths magnetic field often create auroras near the planets poles. The aurora australis or the southern lights, are c… [+5650 chars]
